Class FieldModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.fhnw.connectFour.logic.impl.FieldModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldModel

    public class FieldModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FieldModel
    Handles all fields and sets/remove owners of them.
    Author:
    Michel Heiniger
